[[Tenten]] unseals several weapons from her scrolls, which [[Lee]] and [[Neji]] send at their opponent with a kick and a vacuum palm. Lee and Neji leap into the air, where Lee accelerates the rotation of Neji's [[Eight Trigrams Palms Revolving Heaven]] using the [[Front Lotus]]. Tenten then throws a [[kunai]]-filled string around them, adding to the combination's power. The impact results in an explosion.

[[pl:Kasoku Busō Kaiten]]
